offers.title: Physical Gift Cards

offers.offer_text: Avail Up to ₹4000 discount on Flight booking
offers.title: Up to ₹4000 Off
offers.description: This coupon is valid on Flight booking (On Min. Booking of ₹5000. On Payment via SBI Credit Cards only. Max. 6 times per user)
offers.terms_and_conditions:
Round the year discount - ₹1,000 Off on Domestic Flights

You have a new best friend. Every time you use your Yatra SBI Credit Card, a number of benefits come your way, ranging from reward points to great discounts at Yatra.com. Get your credit card today! 

Here is how the offer works:

Vouchers

As soon as you enroll with this travel card, you get Yatra.com vouchers worth ₹8,250.

  • 2 vouchers worth Rs500 each for Domestic Travel
  • 2 vouchers worth Rs1,000 each for International Travel
  • 1 voucher worth ₹750 for Hotel Bookings
  • 1 voucher worth Rs1,500 for Domestic Holidays
  • 1 voucher worth ₹3,000 for International Holidays

Offer with Yatra
Promo code : TRAVEL

  • ₹1,000 Off on Domestic Flight booking with min. booking amount of ₹5,000
  • ₹4,000 Off on International Flight booking with min. booking amount of ₹40,000
  • Flat 20% Off (Max ₹2,000) on Domestic Hotel booking with min. booking amount of ₹3,000
  • A customer can use the promo code 6 times during a single calendar year.
  • The offer can be used on any of the 3 products in any combination i.e. 2 times on domestic flights, 2 times on international flights and so on.

Reward points

Every time you use your card, you get exciting reward points.

  • 6 Reward Points on every ₹100 spent on Departmental Stores, Groceries, Dining, Movies, Entertainment and International spends.
  • 1 Reward Point on every ₹100 spent on all other categories.
  • Reward Points redeemable for Yatra vouchers (1 Reward Point = 25 Paisa)

Other benefits

  • Fuel Benefits - 1% Fuel Surcharge Waiver across all petrol pumps. Maximum surcharge waiver of ₹100 monthly, per card account. Transactions between ₹500 and ₹3,000.
  • Complimentary Air Accidental - ₹50 Lakhs Air Accidental Cover for Primary cardholder when ticket is booked on Yatra using Yatra SBI Card
  • Anniversary Benefits - Get annual membership fee reversal from second year on annual spends of ₹1,00,000 in the previous year

offers.title: Avail 20% discount
offers.description: This voucher is valid on Domestic Hotel booking (On Min. Booking of ₹3000. On Payment via SBI Credit Cards only. Max. 6 times per user. Max. discount allowed is ₹2000)

offers.offer_text: Avail Up To 30% Discount on selected Domestic Hotels
offers.title: Avail Up to 30% OFF
offers.description: This discount is valid on selected Domestic Hotels (Max. ₹15000 discount will be applicable)
offers.terms_and_conditions:
• Validity Till

    Sept 30, 2020

  • Applicable on

    Domestic Hotels

Ultimate Travel Sale!

We are offering mind-blowing discount of up to 30% OFF on selected domestic hotels. Check the final price after you login or sign up. Hurry, this offer will last for limited period only.

About the Offer

 process:

Terms and Conditions

  • App related bookings are valid on Android & iOS devices only.
  • This offer cannot be clubbed with any other offer extended by Yatra as part of any other arrangement.
  • The offer is not applicable where hotel stay has been split into multiple bookings to avail the offer multiple times. Yatra.com reserves the right to cancel such bookings.
  • In case of a cancellation/refund, the offer amount will be deducted from the total refund due.
  • Yatra Online Pvt. Ltd. ("Yatra") reserves the right to add, alter, modify all or any of these terms and conditions, or replace wholly or in part, this offer by any other offer, whether similar to this offer or not, or to withdraw it altogether, without prior notice.
  • Yatra shall not guarantee or be held responsible or liable for any product or service offered by the hotels which is not within the control of Yatra.
  • All purchases made under the program shall be subject to applicable cancellation/date change rules. In case of a cancellation, Yatra shall reverse the discount and shall not provide additional discount to the customer.
  • Decision of Yatra in all matters connected with or incidental to this offer shall be final and binding.
  • Any disputes arising out of this offer shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of competent courts in Gurgaon, Haryana.
  • All other standard terms and conditions available at Yatra.com shall apply.
